content:
<rule id="3rd-party-15000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <file filename="{*}cloudera{*}.jar"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Cloudera">
                    <description>The application embeds the Cloudera framework.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Cloudera</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
